pipeline.flow: Full pipeline: HMM → BLAST → length filter → MSA → ClipKIT → IQ-TREE → visualize
pipeline.steps_independent: Each step can run independently: upload a file or provide an existing path.
pipeline.clean_headers: Click 'Clean headers' to normalize FASTA headers.
pipeline.recommendations: Recommended params: HMM e-value 1e-5; BLAST e-value 1e-3; ClipKIT kpic-gappy; IQ-TREE MFP + UFBoot 1000.
pipeline.remove_spaces_note: Remove spaces/special characters to produce safe unique sequence names.
pipeline.run_clean: Click 'Clean headers' to normalize FASTA headers.

alerts.provide_fasta: Please upload FASTA or provide a path
alerts.provide_sequences: Please upload sequences or provide a path
alerts.upload_limit: Uploaded file exceeds server limit. Adjust Nginx client_max_body_size or BIOLAB_MAX_CONTENT_MB.
alerts.select_at_least_one: Please select at least one hit

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?

sequence.select_source_required: Please select a source FASTA to delete.
